attack-object.name: Valid Accounts
attack-object.comments: This control is basically a CASB, and various features can generate logs and alerts that can be incorporated into a SIEM such as Sentinel for moderate to high temporal score.
attack-object.score-comment:
This control can identify anomalous behavior such as geographically impossible logins and out-of-character activity. 
Relevant alerts include "Activity from anonymous IP address" , "Activity from infrequent country", "Activity from suspicious IP address", "Impossible Travel", and "Activity performed by terminated user".

attack-object.name: Exfiltration Over Web Service
attack-object.comments: This control is basically a CASB, and various features can generate logs and alerts that can be incorporated into a SIEM such as Sentinel for moderate to high temporal score.
attack-object.score-comment: This control can limit user methods to send data over web services.

attack-object.name: Exfiltration Over Web Service
attack-object.comments: This control is basically a CASB, and various features can generate logs and alerts that can be incorporated into a SIEM such as Sentinel for moderate to high temporal score.
attack-object.score-comment: This control can identify large volume potential exfiltration activity, and log user activity potentially related to exfiltration via web services. A relevant alert is "Unusual file download (by user)".

attack-object.name: Drive-by Compromise
attack-object.comments: This control is basically a CASB, and various features can generate logs and alerts that can be incorporated into a SIEM such as Sentinel for moderate to high temporal score.
attack-object.score-comment: This control can detect outdated client browser software, which is a common target of exploitation in drive-by compromises.

attack-object.name: Unused/Unsupported Cloud Regions
attack-object.comments: This control is basically a CASB, and various features can generate logs and alerts that can be incorporated into a SIEM such as Sentinel for moderate to high temporal score.
attack-object.score-comment: This control can detect unusual region and activity for cloud resources (preview feature as of this writing).  Relevant alert is "Suspicious creation activity for cloud region".

attack-object.name: Forced Authentication
attack-object.comments: This control is basically a CASB, and various features can generate logs and alerts that can be incorporated into a SIEM such as Sentinel for moderate to high temporal score.
attack-object.score-comment: This control can provide significant protection against forced authentication methods by restricting actions associated with multiple file access methods such as SMB.

attack-object.name: Forced Authentication
attack-object.comments: This control is basically a CASB, and various features can generate logs and alerts that can be incorporated into a SIEM such as Sentinel for moderate to high temporal score.
attack-object.score-comment: This control can alert on anomalous sharing attempts of confidential data.

attack-object.name: Data from Cloud Storage Object
attack-object.comments: This control is basically a CASB, and various features can generate logs and alerts that can be incorporated into a SIEM such as Sentinel for moderate to high temporal score.
attack-object.score-comment: This control can detect use of unsanctioned business apps and data exfil to unsanctioned storage apps.

attack-object.name: Steal Application Access Token
attack-object.comments: This control is basically a CASB, and various features can generate logs and alerts that can be incorporated into a SIEM such as Sentinel for moderate to high temporal score.
attack-object.score-comment: This control can restrict user app permissions which can limit the potential for theft of application access tokens.

attack-object.name: Steal Application Access Token
attack-object.comments: This control is basically a CASB, and various features can generate logs and alerts that can be incorporated into a SIEM such as Sentinel for moderate to high temporal score.
attack-object.score-comment: This control can detect potentially risky apps. Relevant alerts include "Misleading publisher name for an Oauth app" and "Misleading OAuth app name".

attack-object.name: Cloud Service Discovery
attack-object.comments: This control is basically a CASB, and various features can generate logs and alerts that can be incorporated into a SIEM such as Sentinel for moderate to high temporal score.
attack-object.score-comment: This control can detect anomalous user activity that may be associated with cloud service discovery. Relevant alert is "Unusual file share activty (by user)".

attack-object.name: Data from Information Repositories
attack-object.comments: This control is basically a CASB, and various features can generate logs and alerts that can be incorporated into a SIEM such as Sentinel for moderate to high temporal score.
attack-object.score-comment: This control can provide fine-grained access control to information sharing repositories such as Sharepoint or Confluence. Due to this capability being limited to these services, it has been scored as Partial coverage resulting in a Partial score.

attack-object.name: Data from Information Repositories
attack-object.comments: This control is basically a CASB, and various features can generate logs and alerts that can be incorporated into a SIEM such as Sentinel for moderate to high temporal score.
attack-object.score-comment: This control may detect anomalous user behavior wrt information repositories such as Sharepoint or Confluence.  Due to this capability being limited to these services, it has been scored as Partial coverage resulting in a Partial score.

attack-object.name: Automated Collection
attack-object.comments: This control is basically a CASB, and various features can generate logs and alerts that can be incorporated into a SIEM such as Sentinel for moderate to high temporal score.
attack-object.score-comment: This control's Information protection policies can detect and encrypt sensitive information at rest on supported platforms, which can inhibit automated data collection activities.

attack-object.name: Automated Collection
attack-object.comments: This control is basically a CASB, and various features can generate logs and alerts that can be incorporated into a SIEM such as Sentinel for moderate to high temporal score.
attack-object.score-comment: This control can detect sensitive information at rest, which may be indicative of data collection activities.

attack-object.name: Data Manipulation
attack-object.comments: This control is basically a CASB, and various features can generate logs and alerts that can be incorporated into a SIEM such as Sentinel for moderate to high temporal score.
attack-object.score-comment: This control can detect and encrypt sensitive information at rest on supported platforms and restrict access.

attack-object.name: External Remote Services
attack-object.comments: This control is basically a CASB, and various features can generate logs and alerts that can be incorporated into a SIEM such as Sentinel for moderate to high temporal score.
attack-object.score-comment: This control's polices for access control can limit abuse of external facing remote services.

attack-object.name: External Remote Services
attack-object.comments: This control is basically a CASB, and various features can generate logs and alerts that can be incorporated into a SIEM such as Sentinel for moderate to high temporal score.
attack-object.score-comment: This control can provide logging of activity associated with potential exploitation of remote services such as anomalous geographic access.

attack-object.name: Remote Access Software
attack-object.comments: This control is basically a CASB, and various features can generate logs and alerts that can be incorporated into a SIEM such as Sentinel for moderate to high temporal score.
attack-object.score-comment: This control can limit potential C2 via unapproved remote access software.

attack-object.name: Remote Access Software
attack-object.comments: This control is basically a CASB, and various features can generate logs and alerts that can be incorporated into a SIEM such as Sentinel for moderate to high temporal score.
attack-object.score-comment: This control can identify potential malicious activity associated with the use or attempted use of unapproved remote access software.

attack-object.name: Domain Policy Modification
attack-object.comments: This control is basically a CASB, and various features can generate logs and alerts that can be incorporated into a SIEM such as Sentinel for moderate to high temporal score.
attack-object.score-comment: This control can detect admin activity from risky IP addresses.

attack-object.name: Account Manipulation
attack-object.comments: This control is basically a CASB, and various features can generate logs and alerts that can be incorporated into a SIEM such as Sentinel for moderate to high temporal score.
attack-object.score-comment: This control can detect anomalous admin activity that may be indicative of account manipulation. Relevant alerts include "Unusual administrative activity (by user)" and "Unusual addition of credentials to an OAuth app".

attack-object.name: Modify Cloud Compute Infrastructure
attack-object.comments: This control is basically a CASB, and various features can generate logs and alerts that can be incorporated into a SIEM such as Sentinel for moderate to high temporal score.
attack-object.score-comment:
This control can identify anomalous admin activity.
Relevant alerts include "Multiple storage deletion activities", "Multiple VM creation activities", and "Suspicious creation activity for cloud region".

attack-object.name: Account Access Removal
attack-object.comments: This control is basically a CASB, and various features can generate logs and alerts that can be incorporated into a SIEM such as Sentinel for moderate to high temporal score.
attack-object.score-comment: This control can identify anomalous admin activity.

attack-object.name: Resource Hijacking
attack-object.comments: This control is basically a CASB, and various features can generate logs and alerts that can be incorporated into a SIEM such as Sentinel for moderate to high temporal score.
attack-object.score-comment: This control can identify some behaviors that are potential instances of resource hijacking. Relevant alerts include "Multiple VM Creation activities" and "Suspicious creation activity for cloud region".

attack-object.name: Data Destruction
attack-object.comments: This control is basically a CASB, and various features can generate logs and alerts that can be incorporated into a SIEM such as Sentinel for moderate to high temporal score.
attack-object.score-comment: This control can identify deletion activity which could be potential malicious data destruction. Relevant Alerts include "Multiple storage deletion activities", "Multiple VM deletion activity", "Unusual file deletion activity (by user), "Suspicous email deletion activiy", and "Ransomware activity".

attack-object.name: Data Encrypted for Impact
attack-object.comments: This control is basically a CASB, and various features can generate logs and alerts that can be incorporated into a SIEM such as Sentinel for moderate to high temporal score.
attack-object.score-comment: This control can detect a range of ransomware-related activities including encryption. Relevant alert include "Ransomware activities" and "Unusual file deletion activity (by user)".

attack-object.name: Application Layer Protocol
attack-object.comments: This control is basically a CASB, and various features can generate logs and alerts that can be incorporated into a SIEM such as Sentinel for moderate to high temporal score.
attack-object.score-comment: This control can identify some evidence of potential C2 via a specific application layer protocol (mail). Relevant alerts include  "Suspicious inbox forwarding" and "Suspicious inbox manipulation rule".

attack-object.name: Brute Force
attack-object.comments: This control is basically a CASB, and various features can generate logs and alerts that can be incorporated into a SIEM such as Sentinel for moderate to high temporal score.
attack-object.score-comment: This control can detect some activity indicative of brute force attempts to login. Relevant alert is "Multiple failed login attempts".

attack-object.name: Internal Spearphishing
attack-object.comments: This control is basically a CASB, and various features can generate logs and alerts that can be incorporated into a SIEM such as Sentinel for moderate to high temporal score.
attack-object.score-comment: This control can identify anomalous user impersonation activity, which can be an element of internal spearphishing. Relevant alert is "Unusual impersonated activity (by user)".
